questions.quote: Talk - call him from your house.  He's calling you now.. okay.
Costanza? Where's Costanza? . . . Excus√© mois? Have you seen Costanza?
No, no, no. You go on ahead. I'm not finished taking this in. Oh, Jerry look ... Merv Griffin's cigar.
Okay.. well, I guess I'm just going to have to take matters into my own hands, huh?  Alright, I'll see you guys.
No noo no, we just bought this. . . . Um, you sold us a cake with a  hair on it.
So... uh you feel okay about that whole thing... what we do in there... you're generally okay with everything in there?
Bernie is dead, you moron!  Just because he's wearing sunglasses he looks alive?!  Ugh, how long is this weekend, anyway?  Ugh!
I suppose if I had suggested Liam Neeson Day, you'd all be patting me on the back.
Ah, man! It's my father's wallet! The one he thought they stole at the doctor's office that time.
It's no big deal Jerry. We'll just meet him at the bubble boy's house.
